sentence.content: At the least, welfare reform should have these goals: to shrink rather than enlarge the welfare system, to ultimately eliminate perverse incentives to remain on welfare, and to make work the focus of the system.

sentence.content: The House bill doesn&apost;t do that.

sentence.content: By adding several welfare programs to what already exists (without eliminating any), the House bill adds another layer to an already complex welfare system.
sentence.syntactictree: (ROOT (S (PP (IN By) (S (VP (VBG adding) (NP (JJ several) (NN welfare) (NNS programs)) (PP (TO to) (SBAR (WHNP (WP what)) (S (ADVP (RB already)) (VP (VBZ exists))))))) (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-) (PP (IN without) (S (VP (VBG eliminating) (NP (DT any))))) (-RRB- -RRB-))) (, ,) (NP (DT the) (NNP House) (NN bill)) (VP (VBZ adds) (NP (DT another) (NN layer)) (PP (TO to) (NP (DT an) (ADJP (RB already) (JJ complex)) (NN welfare) (NN system)))) (. .)))

chunking.string: adds another layer to an already complex welfare system
adding several welfare programs to what already exists

sentence.content: By further increasing rather than gradually reducing the level of benefits available to recipients, it makes welfare more, not less, enticing.
sentence.syntactictree: (ROOT (S (PP (IN By) (S (NP (JJ further)) (VP (VP (VBG increasing)) (CONJP (RB rather) (IN than)) (VP (ADVP (RB gradually)) (VBG reducing) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN level)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (NNS benefits)) (ADJP (JJ available) (PP (TO to) (NP (NNS recipients))))))))))) (, ,) (NP (PRP it)) (VP (VBZ makes) (NP (NN welfare)) (ADVP (RBR more)) (, ,) (S (ADJP (RB not) (RBR less))) (, ,) (S (VP (VBG enticing)))) (. .)))

sentence.content: By diluting proposed work-for-welfare requirements, it diminishes the importance of work.
